Articles.Content:
Hi all. Picked up KSP on Steam a couple of days back and can see that it's money well spent. Surprised to be able to get Kakarin as a user nick, but all the better for me. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Cheers.
Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Glad to hear you've been having fun.

Welcome aboard! You're just in time (sort of) for 1.0, too. Have fun!

Remember, any landing you can walk away from... probably ended terribly. But at least you walked away from it!
